DOC.detailed_description: This research study focus develop implement two one-week activity camp summer 2016 woman diagnose cancer . One camp hold West Philadelphia another Camden , New Jersey , identify underserved area health access . The focus program allow woman engage activity may engage since diagnosis cancer provide opportunity socially interact communicate individual may encounter difficulty . Quality life , pain fatigue information collect , implementation activity program . The main objective demonstrate improve life satisfaction , decrease pain decrease fatigue ( evidence gather three consecutive period geographical location Quality Life , Pain Fatigue survey ) . The intended sample size 57 woman .
